settings.name: Speed exceeding movement abilities of the animal(s)
Movebank marked Outliers
settings.description: Tick if you want to remove locations that have been flagged as outliers in Movebank. (Note that they could already have been filtered out during upload with the Movebank App.)

settings.name: Future timestamp Outliers
settings.description: Tick if you want to remove locations with future timestamps.

settings.name: Name of variable indicating location error
settings.description: Provide the exact name of a variable indicating location error in your data set. All values must be numeric and use consistent units. If unsure, please run the first App in your workflow and check the variable names in the Output Details overview. In Movebank, location error is typically stored as `location error numerical` (in m).

settings.name: Maximum acceptable location error
settings.description: Insert the maximum location error (in the same unit as the location error values) that you find acceptable. All higher values will be filtered out.
